examples: I'm so bored. There's nothing to do.
She looked bored during the meeting.
Estou tão entediado. Não há nada para fazer.
Ela parecia entediada durante a reunião.

suggested: Why did the bored person go to bed? Because they were board.
Feeling bored can make you feel down and unmotivated.
I'm so bored! Why isn't anything exciting happening?
Feeling bored can lead to unexpected moments of creativity and inspiration.
Listening to upbeat music can help shake off boredom and get you energized.
Trying new activities or hobbies is a great way to combat boredom and find new passions.
Changing your mindset and looking at things from a different perspective can help turn boredom into opportunity.
